forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 68. South wind 9 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of thunderstorms and a slight chance of rain between 8pm and 9pm, then rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 41, with temperatures rising to around 50 overnight. South southwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Light Rain Likely then Chance Rain And Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 2pm, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy. High near 44, with temperatures falling to around 37 in the afternoon. West wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Today

forecast.name: Tonight

Cloudy. Low around 26, with temperatures rising to around 31 overnight. North wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: It’s still great! New groom this morning over a strong base with fresh snow . The upper loops have great coverage : both the skate and classic are premium .

nubsNob.xcTrails: The upper trails were power-tilled and tracked on Monday. Expect soft snow today. The upper red is holding snow better compared to the rest of the trails.
nubsNob.comments: Spring skiing continues at Nub's Nob. The snow is granular in texture today and has some set to it in certain areas. The snow should loosen up quickly this morning as the temperature goes up. A rain and snow mix is expected late this afternoon and evening. The Tune Center is now selling the demo skis from this season and we have some amazing deals in the General Store. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
